metadata.title: CVE-2020-26962 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Cross-origin iframes that contained a login form could have been recognizedby the login autofill service, and populated. This could have been used inclickjacking attacks, as well as be read across partitions in dynamic firstparty isolation. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 83.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
